Text:
How do I do to install this? The CD isn't bootable. Do I need to have some boot disks? 

/Peter

You need the boot, driver and beta driver floppyimages from http://download.info.apple.com/Apple_Support_Area/Apple_Software_Updates/MultiCountry/Enterprise/nextstep/floppyimages/. Maybe 
http://qemu-forum.ipi.fi/viewtopic.php?t=1379 helps to get it up and running. Good luck

You need a pretty old graphics card to get this to work properly on intel, as well as one of a select few ata controllers if you want ata. NeXTstep is geared toward SCSI, and it's easier to find a scsi controller to work with NeXTstep than it is to find an ata controller.

Please seed, I'm stuck at  56.4% and am downloading at a whopping 5.06KB! Otherwise it will have to be GNUStep, 
but I really wanted to try the real deal.

Thank you, appreciate it!
If any of you are interested in  a Virtual PC install check out http://www.nleymann.de/Nextstep/VirtualPC.htm
for the appropriate  drivers. and instructions.
Vitual PV 2007 is free and available at:
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/downloads/virtualpc/default.mspx

Check out this link for an awesome install guide:

http://www.nextcomputers.org/forums/viewtopic.php?t=201

Welcome to the best of 1994!

Finally a chance to upgrade my NeXTstation Turbo Color after so many years! Please keep seeding as I am stuck at 27.89%. I promise to seed this 10 to 1!

Do you have any more NeXT goodies in store? I will probably be looking for the y2k patch after upgrading to 3.3...

In turn, I have a good number of NeXT apps I could seed. Looking for anything special?

TNX alot!
how can i burn this image to a cd, i want to install it in my computer, i can't open the iso. i just can use it in virtual pc but doesn't install, it gets stuck with an error while installing.
